methods.name: sort
methods.description:
Call the sort method on the parent Table Component. The
method sorts the current state by the property column.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description:
Call the sort method on the parent Table Component. The
method sorts the current state by the property column.

methods.name: plain
sortable
methods.description: Create a table header with click event handling.

sortable.description: Function to sort the data by the given column

column.description: The name of this column, gets passed to the sortable function

active.description: The name of the actively sorted column

direction.description: The direction of the current sort

className.description: The css classname to apply to the raw th element

showIcon.description: Show the sorting indicator for sortable columns

style.description: Styles to apply to the element
